title: Riot what the hell
body:
So I normally don't post on the Boards just read up and maybe make comments but this trig erred me so hard. loaded up into a ranked game only to see kat had been afk and  disconnected after 1;20 and we couldn't remake and just lost LP for it you can't remake unless they disconnected before load in???? why??


PS have video if anyone wants to see it

replies.body: Wow, yea that really sucks that you couldn't remake. Since that Kat was only AFK for 80 seconds, that would be why the remake never happened. In order to get a [**remake**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686), someone has to be inactive for at *least* 90 seconds before the 3 min mark.
well, yesterday i played a game when someone didn't even move a little bit, at all, it's just that he didn't disconnect, we couldn't remake, and lost.. but he was afk...
